name: MS GB Meta
author: Atlas2052
notes: Just got KoG with this, nothing too major, more monsters so I could brick less with Mind Scan, 3 WoD for CAfirra and Beatdown Hazy, rest of the cards are just good in general. GB's are a solid choice currently, even more so than usual, because of the sheer number of turn 50/general stall decks that are currently on the ladder for some reason, meaning that at worst you are getting a draw.
